caption:
“Seek not comfort but clarity.”

Reflection:
Comfort clouds the soul; clarity cleanses it. To see truth clearly, one must first let go of ease.

Commentary:
This reflection challenges us to trade convenience for conviction. Growth begins where complacency ends — clarity over comfort.
